# Dys-kop

> Dys-kop is a professional mini excavator service website built with Next.js 14, serving the Lublin area in Poland. The site provides information about mini excavator services (Caterpillar 301.8), drilling services (DIGGA PDX2H-2), and includes features like gallery management, contact forms, and an admin panel.

This is a server-side rendered Next.js application using the App Router, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. The site is optimized for SEO with structured data, sitemap, and proper meta tags. It features an admin panel for gallery management using Vercel Blob storage, a contact form with email integration via Nodemailer, and a responsive design with custom UI components built on Radix UI.

**Key Technologies:** Next.js 14, React 18, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Radix UI, Vercel Blob, Nodemailer

**Business Services:**
- Mini excavator services (Caterpillar 301.8, 2-ton excavator)
- Drilling services with DIGGA PDX2H-2 drill (150mm & 250mm diameter, up to 120cm depth)
- Earthworks and linear excavations
- Installing concrete and wooden posts
- Installing anchors and foundations

**Target Area:** Lublin and surrounding districts (Świdnik, Lubartów, Opole Lubelskie, Puławy, Kraśnik)

## Project Structure

- [package.json](./package.json): Project dependencies and scripts
- [next.config.mjs](./next.config.mjs): Next.js configuration
- [tailwind.config.ts](./tailwind.config.ts): Tailwind CSS configuration including custom animations
- [middleware.ts](./middleware.ts): Next.js middleware for routing and authentication
- [tsconfig.json](./tsconfig.json): TypeScript configuration

## Core Pages

- [app/page.tsx](./app/page.tsx): Home page featuring service overview and call-to-action
- [app/layout.tsx](./app/layout.tsx): Root layout with metadata, SEO configuration, and Google Analytics
- [app/o-nas/page.tsx](./app/o-nas/page.tsx): About us page with 360° excavator view and technical specifications
- [app/uslugi-minikoparka-lublin/page.tsx](./app/uslugi-minikoparka-lublin/page.tsx): Services page
- [app/realizacje/page.tsx](./app/realizacje/page.tsx): Portfolio/gallery page showcasing completed projects
- [app/kontakt/page.tsx](./app/kontakt/page.tsx): Contact page with form and business information
- [app/admin/page.tsx](./app/admin/page.tsx): Admin dashboard for gallery management
- [app/login/page.tsx](./app/login/page.tsx): Admin login page

## Components

- [components/layout-wrapper.tsx](./components/layout-wrapper.tsx): Main layout wrapper component
- [components/structured-data.tsx](./components/structured-data.tsx): JSON-LD structured data for SEO
- [components/navbar](./components/navbar): Navigation components
- [components/footer](./components/footer): Footer components
- [components/ui](./components/ui): Reusable UI components (buttons, cards, dialogs, popovers, badges)
